plot: Every person who has ridden in a trolley car knows what it is to be jostled about by the standing crowd, but if you want to see the effects of a collision when everybody is standing, buy this film. It is a good one from start to finish.
title: The Effects of a Trolley Car Collision
plot_es: Every person who has ridden in a trolley car knows what it is to be jostled about by the standing crowd, but if you want to see the effects of a collision when everybody is standing, buy this film. It is a good one from start to finish.
